ActRoyal Canadian Mint Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Issue of Two One-dollar Commemorative Circulation Coins Specifying the Characteristics and Determining the Designs (Oscar Peterson)
PrecisOrder authorizing the Royal Canadian Mint to produce TWO ONE-DOLLAR commemorative circulation coins honouring and celebrating the life, work, and music of OSCAR PETERSON.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0154 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
